name: Magic Moth
description:
A short top down puzzle game made for the 2022 Brackeys Game Jam with the theme 'It is not real'.

You play as a moth mage who is trapped in a dungeon with seemingly no way out. However, you have a magic map that shows you the reality of the dungeon. There are many fake walls, buttons, mazes and puzzles that stand between you and the end of the dungeon, but with the map you are confident that you will find a way out.
